channel.title: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?
channel.description:
Wow so Jagex decided to update their graphic again. So is this the coming of Runescape 3? Or is it an updated Runescape 2? Does that mean Jagex is going to replace RSC with RS2? Or am i trippin balls here, or are the new graphic a new solution to throw us off so we cannot use Jagex's models and it will stop us from taking the models? For what it’s worth it looks like there trying really hard to copy WOW and gain members again.
[ul][li][b][u]Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?[/u][/b][/li][/ul]
[center][img]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j270/n2lil/image_of_the_future_large2.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

A Jagex moderator already confirmed they are never releasing a RuneScape 3. Plus it’s going to be a new detail mode, which is optional.

Read full topic
item.source: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?

item.title: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“xdarklight.x, post:16, topic:206467”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=272276.msg2231784#msg2231784 date=1211170158]
why cant you people see that those are the exact same models, I love how you guys keep saying they are different.
[/quote]

since the models are the same, is your Silbasoft client going to get the new models? since it takes Jagex cache anyways.[/quote]

Man, did you even read her post. There’s no new models, they are rendering the textures differently. [quote=“ninja nub, post:18, topic:206467”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=272276.msg2231986#msg2231986 date=1211180450]

why cant you people see that those are the exact same models, I love how you guys keep saying they are different.

since the models are the same, is your Silbasoft client going to get the new models? since it takes Jagex cache anyways.

Your mental capacity clearly doesn’t surpass that of a gnat.
[/quote]

Did you just say that to Miss Silabsoft?[/quote]

Obviously he said it to xdarklight.x, seeing as he quoted him.

Read full topic

item.title: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:21, topic:206467”][quote author=f 2 p 2 p f link=topic=272276.msg2232118#msg2232118 date=1211195402]
Wow you guys are easy to impress, I do alittle 3d rendering with 3dmax. All jagex have done is made it shiny,taken squares out and added curves look close to the new and old pictures but they are doing a good job and a good come back after wild being taken.

And a note to this they are more worried about there precious Arcanist than to bother with Rs3 but they probably have Rs3 planed out.
[/quote]

I highly doubt your brain can handle that. And why are you acting as if they didn’t do a good job and you can dod better?[/quote]They may have a different runescape, I saw plans on a game called “Mech-Scape” and Jagex has bought a site for it…

I have no idea, could be the last puch to the gut before runescape dies…

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I think I’d also shit myself if they made the control’s in the WASD style. I think it would improve the game a lot. Though you never know how these things are going to turn out. Jagex usually fucks up with this sorta stuff. (for example they would say : NEW UPDATE, YOU ALL GET 1MIL, then in the small print they’d say: O BTW u can’t actually use the 1mil for anything useful)

item.title: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:6, topic:206467”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=272276.msg2230682#msg2230682 date=1211120828]

models will stay the same for sure, they will probably remove what ever dulls down the textures

http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/background/ <- dumped textures have a much higher quality then the rendered ones.

However they might just add another format if need be, thats what they did with the new rs2 engine just added a new format with bigger texturing capabilitys. they did not convert any of the old models just simply added new ones with a different header size.

I was thinking maybe the format would change, is this going to mean that we will need to get a different model grabbing tool? or should it all still work?

knowing jagex they will change the update procedure when ever they feel its needed. so it doesnt have to be with this update. but it COULD be any update.
[/quote]
It might be more likely to be this update though because its a big step[/quote]
no reason too, the system they have now is advanced enough they don’t fix things that arnt broken.

Read full topic
item.source: Image of The Future or The coming of Runescape 3?
